content: the lauren light & easy long sleeve crochet top is a light long sleeve crochet top it is perfect on it s own in the warmer months or as a beautiful first layer under cardigans and coats in the colder months it features a slightly oversized loose design and long sleeves with ribbing on the sleeve cuffs this is a classic kiks and jack crochet pattern at its simple best nothing too fussy or over engineered just a gorgeous modern top created by you customized by you and unique as you re the only person who has one the neckline can be customized to be tighter and on the shoulder or customized to be off the shoulder the stitches used to create the main panels are simple and beginner friendly and remain the same throughout the sleeves the lauren light & easy long sleeve crochet top is a free and easy crochet pattern available as a size inclusive made to measure pattern it is designed and written specifically for beginners
